id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
**string**: The display model to use. One of the following options:
  * `TTGO TDisplay 135x240`
  
  * `Adafruit Funhouse 240x240`
  
  * `Adafruit RR 280x240` (round-rectangular display – some pixels are “deleted” from corners to form rounded shape)
  
  * `Custom` (see details below)
  
  

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

backlight_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The display’s backlight pin.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

eightbitcolor.docs:
**boolean**: Limits the supported color depth to eight bits. May be useful on memory-constrained devices.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

height.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the `height` of the display in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

width.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the `width` of the display in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

offset_height.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the display’s vertical offset in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

offset_width.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the display’s horizontal offset in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to re-draw the screen. Defaults to `5s`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*
